mapper.select: SELECT id, storename, business, tel, address, grade, thema FROM store ORDER BY id asc
SELECT id, storename, business, tel, address, grade, thema FROM store where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store ( storename, business, tel, address, grade, thema ) VALUES ( #{storename}, #{business}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{grade}, #{thema} )
mapper.update: update store set storename=#{storename}, business=#{business}, tel=#{tel}, address=#{address}, grade=#{grade}, thema=#{thema} where id = #{id}
